channel.title: It may not matter to much.. But what java for dummies book is recommended.?
channel.description:
what is the best edition to start with or best overall because there quite expensive.
edit: ew they only have the 3rd edition which is for java7.

item.title: It may not matter to much.. But what java for dummies book is recommended.?
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Jack_Sparrow Captain Jack Sparrow
item.description:
@Captain_Jack_Sparrow wrote:

thats for java 7 thought, doesnt rsc work with java 6?

i seen an edition for jdk 6 so i tried the local book shop and they cant get it cuz the print is out so i tried ebay and no go for that… so i tried amazon and im getting it from there : )

item.title: It may not matter to much.. But what java for dummies book is recommended.?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

http://www.dummies.com/how-to/computers-software/programming/java.html

Take a look at the above, may be helpful.

Also, http://www.dummies.com/store/product/Beginning-Programming-with-Java-For-Dummies-3rd-Edition.productCd-0470371749.html
